trans-unit.source:
Dear %firstName%,

Your ad in the subject line has been online for 30 days. It is important to us, that our candidates receive current offers always. Please click here if the ad is still up to date: %confirmUrl% Please click here if you would like to deactivate the display: %deactivateUrl%Thank you for your cooperation!

Best Regards,
Your Transport Talent Team
trans-unit.target: Kære,% firstName%, Din annonce i emnefeltet har været online i 30 dage. Det er vigtigt for os at vores brugere altid modtager aktuelle jobannoncer. Klik her, hvis annoncen stadig er aktuel: %confirmUrl% Klik venligst her, hvis du vil deaktivere annoncen: %deaktivereUrl% På forhånd tak, Transport Talent teamet
